sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>0</base_damage> <critical_rating/> <defense/> <description>Any piece of armor can benefit from retooling at the hands of a superior craftsman. A skilled armorsmith can add improved plastoid or even durasteel plating to increase the protection a piece of armor offers even as he decreases its weight and bulk. Of course, such delicate and exacting work can make the armor less customizable in other respects. Models Include: Numerous Variants. Base Modifiers: Gives the armor the Superior Quality. Modification Options: None.</description> <encumbrance/> <hard_points/> <hp_required>1</hp_required> <name>Superior Armor Customization</name> <number>GEAR0001166</number> <price>5000</price> <range/> <rarity>6</rarity> <skill_used/> <soak/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-19 04:53:13</sys_created_on> <sys_id>5f4ef7f92fa42c90e0f497eef699b666</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-19 04:53:13</sys_updated_on> <type>mod</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
